short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks and updates the USD to EGP exchange rate every hour.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated with the latest USD to EGP exchange rates right from your Chrome browser. This extension provides real-time exchange rate information, automatically updating every hour to ensure you always have the most current data.

Features:

- Real-Time Updates: Automatically fetches and displays the current USD to EGP exchange rate every hour.
- Manual Refresh: Includes a convenient refresh button to update the rate instantly whenever you need the latest information.
- Sleek Design: Features a modern, gradient background with an intuitive interface for an enhanced user experience.
- Easy Access: Simply click the extension icon to view the current exchange rate without leaving your browser.
